original_text: When Josiah had been king for eight years, he was still a young man. At that time he began to worship God, as his ancestor David had done. When he had been king for 12 years, he started to remove the places in Jerusalem and in all Judah where people worshipped false gods. He removed the altars on the hills, the Asherah poles, the idols and the images of false gods.
korean_text: 아직도 어렸을 때 곧 왕위에 있은 지 팔 년에 그의 조상 다윗의 하나님을 비로소 찾고 제십이년에 유다와 예루살렘을 비로소 정결하게 하여 그 산당들과 아세라 목상들과 아로새긴 우상들과 부어 만든 우상들을 제거하여 버리매

sentences.original_text: When Josiah had been king for eight years,
sentences.korean_translation: 요시아가 왕이 된 지 팔 년이 되었을 때,

sentences.original_text: he was still a young man.
At that time he began to worship God,
as his ancestor David had done.
When he had been king for 12 years,
he started to remove the places
in Jerusalem and in all Judah
He removed the altars on the hills,
the idols and the images of false gods.
